MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: barcode, Code 39 barcode, Code 3 of 9 bar code
English.Char_Desc_45: Code39Azalea is a free Code 39 demo font.
English.Char_Desc_80: Code39Azalea is a free Code 39 demo TrueType font from Azalea's C39Tools.
English.Char_Desc_250: Code39Azalea is a free Code 39 demo TrueType font. It creates numeric-only barcode symbols. Code39Azalea is a subset of C39Tools, Azalea's full font collection. C39Tools creates Code 39 barcodes from with any Windows.
English.Char_Desc_450: Code39Azalea is a free Code 39 demo TrueType font. It creates numeric-only barcode symbols. Therefore any string you create must contain the digits 0-9. The asterisk (*) is used as the start and stop bar. For example, *123*. Code39Azalea is a subset of C39Tools, Azalea's full font collection. C39Tools creates Code 39 barcodes from with any Windows including Excel, Access, Visual Basic, C/C++, Crystal Reports and other applications.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Code39Azalea is a free Code 39 demo TrueType font. It creates numeric-only barcode symbols. Therefore any string you create must contain the digits 0-9. The asterisk (*) is used as the start and stop bar. For example, *123*. Code39Azalea is a subset of C39Tools, Azalea's full font collection. C39Tools creates Code 39 barcodes from with any Windows including Excel, Access, Visual Basic, C/C++, Crystal Reports and other applications. We have a large library of free sample code at www.azalea.com/SampleCode Azalea Software publishes a full catalog of bar code fonts that support UPC, EAN, Code 128, Code 39, Interleaved 2 of 5, PDF 417, Data Matrix, and other barcode and OCR symbologies. Please visit our website at: www.azalea.com or call us at 1.206.341.9500

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
Code39Azalea.zip contains Code39Azalea.ttf, a TrueType font that creates Code 39 bar code symbols. Code39Azalea is a free demo of C39Tools, our full Code 39 product - www.azalea.com/Code39
Code39Azalea can be used for personal, non-commerical use but must not be distributed or resold outside of Code39Azalea.zip. Code39Azalea is to be used for evaluation and review purposes.
Code39Azalea is copyright 2005 Jerry Whiting. All rights reserverd. If you have questions, please contact us at salesinfo@azalea.com or 1.206.341.9500
